property.name: CSVFileName
property.propertydescription: Select or Enter CSV File name

property.name: Playback Time
property.propertydescription: Play back time option at which play back data will be passed to destination

property.name: Time Processing Mode
property.propertydescription: Select processing mode for data source

property.name: TimePeriodType
property.propertydescription: Select time period type

property.name: Time Factor
property.propertydescription: Time factor value for data processing mode

property.name: PlaybackDSTimeProperties
property.propertydescription: PlaybackDSTime property shows dialog for PlaybackTime, TimeProcessingMode and TimePeriodType properties

property.name: SpawnerDetails
property.propertydescription: Spawner Details dialog shows Spawner Option, PlaybackTime, TimeProcessingMode properties.

property.name: Playback Time
property.propertydescription: Play back time option at which play back data will be passed to destination

property.name: Starting Point
property.propertydescription: Starting point for the System ID format

property.name: System ID Format
property.propertydescription: Enter System ID format to be used for each spawned datapoint

property.name: TimePeriodType
property.propertydescription: Select time period type

property.name: SpawnerOption
property.propertydescription: Select spawner option

property.name: Output Interval
property.propertydescription: Enter output interval in seconds

property.name: Number of Items
property.propertydescription: No of Items to spawn

property.name: Parameter Unit
property.propertydescription: Parameter unit for the selected parameter number

property.name: SystemID
property.propertydescription: System ID associated with the PlugIn

property.name: EquipmentEventDetails
property.propertydescription: Equipment Event Details consists of SystemId, SytemType, ParameterNumber, ParameterUnit and unit of time for PlugIn

property.name: Parameter Number
property.propertydescription: Parameter no. associated with the PlugIn

property.name: System Type
property.propertydescription: System type associated with the PlugIn

property.name: Maximum Value
property.propertydescription: Maximum range of Y-axis

property.name: Minimum Value
property.propertydescription: Minimum range of Y-axis

property.name: Time Window
property.propertydescription: Duration to be displayed on the graph

property.name: TimePeriodType
property.propertydescription: Select time period type

property.name: Graph Update Interval
property.propertydescription: Graph update interval in HH:MM:SS

property.name: Hostname
property.propertydescription: Name of the host

property.name: Port Number
property.propertydescription: Port number for communication

property.name: SGEEComponent
property.propertydescription: Select SGEE component

property.name: SGEEComponent Details
property.propertydescription: SGEE component Details dialog shows SGEE component selection, host number and port number properties.
